description:
A young detective lockpicks his way into Nagumo`s office and asks to work for him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Asunaro, le grand détective/Mon talent inégalé à votre service !/Il n’y a pas pire qu’un harceleur qui s’ignore
Great Detective Asunaro / The Ones Who Don`t Realize They`re Stalkers Are the Most Dangerous
Meitantei Asunaro / Stalker no Jikaku ga Nai Yatsu ga Ichiban Yabai
名探偵アスナロ / ストーカーの自覚がない奴が一番ヤバい
